title: Mike Spinelli
description: Mike Spinelli is back in California for the Aston Martin full-line drive and he graces us with his presence on the podcast yet again. Matt returned home to find his Vanquish with a new transmission, we swap stories from the premier of Apex and we give a quick review of "And On That Bombshell".
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
